apple-provider.plugin.name: Apple Auth Provider
apple-provider.settings.enabled.label: Enable Sign in with Apple
apple-provider.settings.enabled.hint: Allow users to log in with Sign in with Apple once configuration is complete.
apple-provider.settings.client-id.label: Client ID (Service ID)
apple-provider.settings.client-id.hint: The Service ID configured for Sign in with Apple.
apple-provider.settings.team-id.label: Team ID
apple-provider.settings.team-id.hint: Find it in the top-right corner of your Apple Developer account.
apple-provider.settings.key-id.label: Key ID
apple-provider.settings.key-id.hint: The identifier of the AuthKey used for generating the client secret.
apple-provider.settings.redirect-url.lab: The redirect URL to your front-end app
apple-provider.settings.redirect-url.hin: Your users will be redirected to this URL with the Apple authorization code.
apple-provider.settings.callback.label: Strapi callback URL
apple-provider.settings.callback.hint: Add this URL to the Apple Developer console as an allowed return URL.
apple-provider.settings.auth-key.label: AuthKey_XXXXXXXXXX.p8 file
apple-provider.settings.auth-key.hint: Upload the private key downloaded from the Apple Developer portal.
apple-provider.settings.auth-key.none: No key has been uploaded yet.
